alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 1:55PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Juab and southeastern Tooele Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 154 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Fish Springs Wildlife Refuge to 23 miles southwest of Vernon. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dugway English Village, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Fish Springs Wildlife Refuge and Utah Test and Training Range South. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Western Millard and Juab Counties
